Title: Relates to creating a state office of algorithmic innovation
Summary: Creates a state office of algorithmic innovation to set policies and standards to ensure algorithms are safe, effective, fair, and ethical, and that the state is conducive to promoting algorithmic innovation.
LawCode: Add Art 38-A ยง860, Exec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to creating the office of algorithmic innovation
